title: Almond baklava
ingredients: ['400g caster sugar', '475ml water', '350g honey', '1 cinnamon stick', '1/4 lemon', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '675g chopped almonds', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '340g unsalted butter, melted', '1 (500g) packet filo pastry']
